content: Set terminal title to indicate refactoring work
Create src/discovery/ directory for modular refactoring
Create src/discovery/registry.rs for type registry access functions
Create src/discovery/error.rs for unified error handling utilities
Create src/discovery/examples.rs for primitive and type example generation
Create src/discovery/types.rs for TypeInfo processing and analysis
Create src/discovery/spawn.rs for spawn format generation logic
Create src/discovery/mutation.rs for mutation info generation logic
Create src/discovery/core.rs for main discovery orchestration
Create src/discovery/handler.rs for public API and request handling
Create src/discovery/mod.rs to organize module exports and maintain public API
Move type registry access functions to registry.rs and eliminate duplication
Create unified error handling approach in error.rs to eliminate dual debug/error function versions
Move primitive example generation to examples.rs and consolidate duplicate functions
Move TypeInfo processing logic to types.rs and eliminate pattern matching duplication
Move spawn format generation to spawn.rs and consolidate duplicate struct/tuple/enum functions
Move mutation info generation to mutation.rs and consolidate duplicate functions
Move main discovery orchestration to core.rs with unified error handling
Move handler function and public API to handler.rs
Replace src/discovery.rs with re-exports from the new modular structure
Build project and fix any compile errors from refactoring
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues following project guidelines
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task subagent to do code review of refactored discovery module focusing on duplication and complexity
Review code review suggestions with user before proceeding
